12.content:
A game of Duel monster's this was how life went for any duelist, walk around town eat, duel, no matter what one did if you had a deck you'd be challenged to a duel. Mai, being the woman with the pun name was no exception to this, in fact it was potentially worse for her. Many would ask her out and she couldn't always go "Duel me and we'll see." or something. Besides Joey Wheeler had found her heart even if he wasn't all that bright he did know the value of his friends and anyone who had even shown him a hint of kindness. The only issue was how often he was with Yugi, Mai didn't mind Yugi but Joey as stated wasn't too bright, she needed to get him alone, but how? She walked absent mindly for a while when she came by a woman with a cloak. The woman was MASSIVE in height and even intimidated Mai. She was at least 14ft tall. For a moment Mai thought this was a prank or a prop for some kind of Kaiba corp event.

"Now I know that look." The woman's voice was deep as she addressed Mai. "Two things are on your mind, one, how did she get so tall? and two, how do I get my boyfriend to notice me?"

"Not in that order and he's not my boyfriend!" Mai proclaimed with a blush.

"Yes I'm sure." The woman chuckled. She reached into her cloak. Mai couldn't help but notice her arms were thick. "Here, he'll notice you." She held out a carp, it was a spell card with Mai's face on it.

"What is this a joke?" Mai looked at the card "Mai, Growth." She looked to the woman unamused. "Funny..." She mumbled with sarcasm. "So what, use this in a duel?"

"Turn on your disk and use it now if you wish." The woman was gone in the blink of an eye. Looking to her duel disc Mai...


Authors note: I didn't really know which arc to go with for sure past Duelist Kingdom obviously but the choice is up to the next adder.
12.title: Oh Mai

1511.title: Sakura

15111.content:
https://ww1.gogoanime.io/card-captor-sak...

Sakura and Maddison had been deciding on Sakura's next out fit when they decided on the one from her adventure with the little card
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=-pJ7imc0Ns...


They had then gone to where Sakura had sensed a clow card earlier.
Li and Meilin were already there.

They soon sensed something in the darkness.
Moments later it revealed itself to be a cat specifically a giant cat.


While the cat played with Li , Sakura and Maddison went on.
Soon they found a rather tall woman sitting on the edge of a fountain holding some sort of wand and surrounded by a few very large plants.


Kero had caught up with them too.

"Careful Sakura that's a clow card and she can cause lots of trouble even just by sitting"

The woman smiled and they watched as she tapped a small fish in the fountain which then proceeded to grow until it was nearly too big for the fountain.
It was half the size of the vat from early and splashed lots of water as the fountain no longer held enough water for it to swim in at its size.


The woman stood up.
Sakura gulped.
She was about to seal it when she approached.


The woman shocked them by speaking in a gentle and motherly tone.

"I sense a dilemma and a battle soon to come.
I sense you have a sibling who mocks your stature and that you yourself feel inadequate.
It's quite ashame too since the coming battle is more than you can handle in that present state"


Sakura took a nervous step back.

"No need to fear little one. Such a tender age and delicate age for a growing girl.
Let me help guide you"

Sakura closed her eyes from inexplicable fear.
She felt something make contact with her forehead.



Slowly she opened her eyes to see the woman was holding the wand to her forehead.
"Eh?"

"Just remember the enlightenment your brother lacks, sometimes big things can come in small packages and sometimes the small don't stay that way forever"

Finally she removed her want.
Sakura regained her composure and was about to use the staff when the card vanished.

There wasn't much time to react tho.
Li had escaped jumbo cat and they sensed another card.

The group walks ahead to the park where freaky Stuff happens.

Then it appeared, a huge dragon.
They tried to stop but nothing worked.


Suddenly Sakura felt strange.
"Quick back away" she ordered.

Everyone did as told.
Suddenly Sakura began growing clothes and all.
She grew until she was around about half the dragons overall size.

"Wow I really grew? Everything looks so different from up here. I wonder if this is how Alice felt?" She added convienently dressed similar to Alice.

Kero flew up.
"Careful Sakura 1 wrong step from you and things may not be so good for the gang down there"

Sakura bent down with a sweatdrop on her face.
"Oh right sorry. This slightly embarrassing"


Li just stood there with his jaw dropped.


"Focus Sakura you need to stop that dragon" said Kero.

"Right" she said standing back up.
The dragon was headed towards the city.
She ran and grabbed its tail.
She struggled trying to hold it back.


Unfortunately she wasn't quite strong enough however she did annoy the dragon.
It stopped and fired a few fireballs at Sakura.
She released its tail and dodged.

In anger it chased her shooting more fireballs.
Finally she dodged yet another but in the process tripped.


She landed face first in the dirt mostly unharmed except dirt on her face.
She feared the dragon would do her in and briefly looking forward covered her head.
After a few moments she noticed nothing was happening and dared a peak.

( http://m.imgur.com/a/ojSQK start from bottom pic on up )

"Huh it's gone?"

In truth the dragon lost interest no longer viewing Sakura as a threat or worth its time.



Sakura then looked down in front of her.
The woman from before had returned.

"You're back"

"My you've blossomed but I'm afraid I miscalculated you're still outmatched"

"It's the big card again" said Maddison.

She then approached Sakura's face a tapped her nose with her wand.

Sakura was rapidly filling the park.

“You know this would have been useful when I was fighitng the dragon!” Sakura fumed, the ground and her friends still moving away from her. She tried to grab the Big, but it easily dodged her.

“Put me back to normal!” Sakura boomed, her voice louder than before. Big only laughed and jumped away.

“Get back here!” Sakura brought her foot down, trying to pin Big, but she was too slow. Sakura ran after her but Big had already gained some distance on her. Sakura’s footsteps filled the air as she gave chase, but she stopped for a second when she heard Kero call to her.

“Hey careful Sakura!” She looked at her. He seemed so small now, barely larger than insect. “Watch your step!” He gestured at Sakura’s friends, who had been knocked off their feet.

“Oh sorry.” Sakura said sheepishly, before realising she had given Big a chance to get further away from her.

15522111.content:
The Professor had been working on his latest invention: The Mass Enlarger. It was in the form of a ray gun that could enlarge the mass of anything, be it plant, animal, human, alien, or inanimate object.

The Professor had just finished his invention. Once he was done he decided to rest in the lobby. He put the ray gun on his table and left his lab.

As soon as he left, some entered his lab. That someone was Leela. Feeling a little bored she decided to go to the Professor's lab and see what he was inventing this time. "Professor are you here?" Leela asked. No one answered. When Leela heard no reply she walked to the Professor's table. Almost instantly she saw the Mass Enlarger.

"What's this?" Leela asked as she picked it up. She curiously looked at it. She had the gun point at her foot. While looking at it her finger accidentally pulled the trigger. The gun went off, and a blue ray shot from it. The ray hit her foot.

Leela was soon overwhelmed by a warm feeling in her body, that quickly began to increase. "What's happening?" Leela asked. Her clothes suddenly felt tight, and continued to get tighter. Leela looked around the lab and saw that everything was getting smaller and smaller. Leela soon knew what was happening to her.

"I'm growing." Leela said.

How tall would Leela get?
15522111.title: The Mass Enlarger

choices: Shrink down to her original height
155221112.content:
Leela did nothing as she watched herself get taller. Her clothes were excruciatingly tight. Soon they could not take anymore of Leela's growing body. First her feet outgrew her boots. Then she outgrew her shirt. Just when she thought she was going to lose more clothing, the growth had stopped.

When Leela noticed she wasn't growing anymore, she was relieved. She looked at herself. Leela guessed she was 9ft tall. She had her panties, pants, and bra on, but they felt excruciatingly tight.

Everything in the lab looked smaller. Leela was big. Though the growth had scared her, Leela admitted that she liked the growth somewhat.

Looking at the Mass Enlarger, Leela decided to...
